item.title: Blockchain, IOT, AI and any ‘hipster’ tech
item.description: I have seen a lot of movement in new startups about this new tech trend, in my opinion we need to work on enhance this tech, because is too early in term of implementation, security and real usage. I think the real usage for now is about of speculation money and raise founds by: get a lot of money for my mediocre idea. using startups, ideas, etc
